Package cs350s22.component.sensor

Class A_Sensor

java.lang.Object
cs350s22.component.A_Component
cs350s22.component.sensor.A_Sensor
All Implemented Interfaces:
I_Sequenceable, I_Serviceable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MySensor
public abstract class A_Sensor extends A_Component
Defines the shared elements of a sensor.
